text: The Disastrous Life of Saiki K is a manga series created by Shūichi Asō in May of 2012, it started as a one-shot in 2010 called "Special One-Shot: The DiPSIster of Psychic Saiki Kusuo". The manga was published by the Japanese publishing company, Shueisha == Premise == it is about Kusuo Saiki, who is a 16-year-old boy that has psychic abilities but tries to hide them to live a ordinary life in High school. Category:Manga Category:2016 anime television series
title: The Disastrous Life of Saiki K
